title: Immunological nanomaterials to combat cancer metastasis
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D2CS00968D, Review Article
Yuanbo Pan, Junjie Cheng, Yang Zhu, Jianmin Zhang, Wenpei Fan, Xiaoyuan Chen
This review highlights recent advances in immunological nanomaterials against metastasis and summarizes various immunological nanomaterial-mediated immunotherapy strategies.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
